scripts.win:fix-x64-packages: npm run win:fix-x64-extract-file-icon && npm run win:fix-x64-node-window-manager
scripts.packager-win: npm run react-build && electron-packager ./ zoomcommander --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --out ./OutAppWin32 --electron-version=11.0.1 --overwrite --icon=./public/icon.ico && cp -r ../node_modules ./OutAppWin32/zoomcommander-win32-ia32/resources/node_modules && cp -r ../lib ./OutAppWin32/zoomcommander-win32-ia32/resources/lib && mkdir .\OutAppWin32\zoomcommander-win32-ia32\resources\sdk && cp -r ../sdk/win32 ./OutAppWin32/zoomcommander-win32-ia32/resources/sdk/win32
scripts.packager-mac: npm run react-build && electron-packager ./ zoomcommander --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out ./OutApp --electron-version=11.0.1 --overwrite --icon=./public/icon.icns && yes|cp -R  -H ../node_modules ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/Resources/ && yes|cp -R  -H ../lib ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/Resources/ && mkdir ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/Resources/sdk && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/Resources/sdk/ &&yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/Plugins ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/ && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/Resources ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/&& yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/ZoomSDK/* ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/Frameworks && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/libprotobuf-lite.14.dylib ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/Frameworks && rm ./OutApp/zoomcommander-darwin-x64/zoomcommander.app/Contents/Resources/app/.env
scripts.start: env-cmd concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none npm run react-start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run start:electron"
